survey_name: Online Learning Platform User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of online learning platforms to understand their satisfaction levels, challenges faced, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which online learning platform do you use most frequently?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture platforms not listed. Ensure the list is randomized to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which online learning platform do you use most frequently?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall user experience of the platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall user experience of the platform?

questions.question_text: What features do you find most valuable in the platform? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Randomize the order of options to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What features do you find most valuable in the platform? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you encounter technical issues while using the platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale. Ensure the scale is clear and unambiguous.

script.question_text: How often do you encounter technical issues while using the platform?

questions.question_text: What types of courses do you typically enroll in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Randomize the order of options to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What types of courses do you typically enroll in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this platform to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this platform to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the platform?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the platform?

questions.question_text: How do you primarily access the platform?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture devices not listed. Ensure the list is randomized to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How do you primarily access the platform?

questions.question_text: How important is the availability of certification upon course completion to you?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How important is the availability of certification upon course completion to you?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using an online learning platform?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture reasons not listed. Ensure the list is randomized to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio button with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using an online learning platform?
